commit message: Initial import of source, both android and lib projects from original SVN revision 377
Import of the external ActionBarSherlock project used in Transdroid.
Android /bin and /gen directories should not be in Mecurial.

Final part of import: get project to compile again though some small properties.
HG ignore file for /gen and /bin.
Layout bugs fixed.

More bug fixes.
New 1.1.2 release.

Fixed barcode scanner start (issue 383).
Removed now-defunct BTJunkie search site form list.
Prevent crash in RSS screen when moving away.
Disable FTP download options for clietns that not suppoirt it (like qBittorrent).
Prevent showing of FTP download option when no path is known for a file.
Updated translations.
Merged remote and local development branches.
Added Shazam song share support (issue 193).

Added alarm notification LED colour including costumizable colour setting (issue 384).
(Also some small crash fixes.)
Preparing new release.
Fixed issue 385, not showing the download location in the dialog when changing this.

Adding proper altenative (turtle)mode support.
Adding basic server stats (not displayed yet; issue 131).
Fixed removing of torrents in qBittorrent (issue 344).

Added tracker list and error messages to qBittorrent (issue 345).
(ALso removed BTJunkie enum value.)
Added view for only active (both seeding and downloading) torrents (issue 349).
New 1.1.3 release.
Only get free space on Transmission when version >= 2.20 (RPC version 12).
Working on an update service that check the latest version.
Update service that checks for new app and search module versions.
Added support for Seedstuff.
Added Demonoid search (compatible with the search module version 1.6).
Support for new style Xirvik shared servers.
Added changelog message for 1.1.4 release.

Incorporated suggestions: permitting any sep (or none) and indicate we are
using SHA-1 hash
Accept magnet url's in Add screen.

Support AndFTP alias:// construct and don't send the username/passwor din that case (issue 388).
Work around the AndFTP bug that the leading / in a file path without further directories (so with the file in the FTP root) caused AndFTP not to find the file.
Merged patch from Alexey Rogovoy with label-related fixes.
Fixed project setup.
Started 1.1.6 version.
Merged changes.
Added BitComet support, courtesy of Sergey (SeNS). Thanks\!
Allow gzipped content in RSS feeds.
Added support for Deluge's web interface password as seperate values from the HTTP auth password and username (see issue 260).
Fix ratio bug (when downloading only part of the files), see issue 405.\nFixed Deluge highest priority bug, see issue 396.
Added Transmission's comment field, which ends up in the error text message in the details screen for now. See issue 207.
Support qBittorrent versions 3.0.0 and up (issue 412).
Import and export the new extra password (for the Deluge web interface) setting to/from JSON settings files.
Updated the available search sites.
Fixed crash; see issue 415.
Updated translations.
Allow upper case characters in SSH key SHA-1. Thanks Fabio! See issue 124.
Bugfix relating to issue 412; version number was used incorrectly.
Transdroid 1.1.7 release.
Applied Sergey's patch for improved (XML instead of HTML parsing) based BitCOmet support.
Merged upstream changes.
Fix for non-English KTorrent users; see issue 201.
Add a random string to the update download intents to circumvent Android's aggressive caching of urls.
Added date added and explicit date done support for uTorrent (issue 370) and date added support for Deluge and date doen support for Transmission.
Added error reporting for tracker errors; see issue 336.
Tried to add support for labels with Deluge (issue 417), but it doesn't seem to work.
Properly catch old BitComet installed to revert to using HTML parsing.
Merged upstream changes.
Added Bitsnoop to the list of supported search sites.
Filter list dialog added. (Thanks Tom Briden\!)
Added support for deleting data on removing of torrent. (Thanks Tom Briden\!)
Updated translations. Thanks to all translators\!
Uses real 'time added' with rTorrent if user has the seedingtime plugin. (Thanks Tom Briden\!)
Support labels in rTorrent depending on ruTorrent's default behaviour of storing labels in the custom1 field. (Thanks Tom Briden\!)
Show current location in change download location popup.\nUpdated to version 1.1.10 release.
Allow content:// uris by reading if from the download manager before uploading the file (issue 442).
Support setting of labels with rTorrent (thanks tom Briden\!)
Intent filter for http bittorrent links was broken (issue 453).
Fix crash caused by a cast error (creationtime field can be an Integer or a Long, depending on the used dialect).
Prevent crash when Rtorrent does not return teh addtime or seedingtime custom fields (as timestamp).
Enable The Pirate Bay (Mirror) as supported search site.
Prevent crash with Bittorrent when size/speed is set to Unknown instead of an actual value.
Don't treat tracker errors in Deluge as blocking.
Added option to disable the update checker (in alarm settings screen).
Encode communication with Transmission in UTF-8 to support non-Western characters.
Updated ActionBarSherlock to 4.2.0
Started Transdroid Lite project, which also serves as new UI development project.
Started Transdroid Lite project, which also serves as new UI development project.
Building the new UI.
Further work on new layout.
Creating new preferences screens.
Build torrent and details fragment UI and started on logic.
Getting the details screen lay out properly.
Fixing the details fragment to show and with a proper layout of headers.\nStarting task execution.
Working on task execution and navigation list.
Fixing screen flow.
Fix bug in ActionBarSherlock.\nPick up torrent files from the download manager intents.
Treat torrents with unknown eta as finishing in the far future rather than the far past.
Fix qBittorrent version parsing for beta version (like 3.0.0-alpha5).
Fixed apostroph escaping in changelog xml.
Merged bugfixes into newui branch.
Renamed lite directory to core, as it will serve as UI core project for market and full versions.
Use general import of classes in package to work around an Eclipse bug with generated classes (https://github.com/excilys/androidannotations/wiki/FAQ#wiki-import)
Split Transdroid into Lite (no search and RSS) and Full versions, with the Core project containing all function code.
Fix server timeout setting parsing.
Reload settings in main settings screen on returning to the screen.
Add About screen/fragment.
Small fixes in dialog instantiation.
Updated RSS action bar icons to correct size.
Fixed dialog showing on small and large devices.
Fix state in which no settings are know and no loading is performed.
Add Crouton library and updated Andorid Support Library.
Use the Crouton library to display errors and success messages.
Fix various layout issues.
Added removing and fixed updating of settings.
Fix removal of settings.
Added tutle mode action bar icons.
Make action bar spinner navigation appear correctly.
rTorrent adapter should return the labels that it encountered during torrents retrieval.
Showing labels in the navigation list or spinner.
Fix loading of server settings, albels and show proper loading state.
Update action bar spinner view on new filter selection.
Added barcode scanning and handling of bar code scan results.
Adding of torrent via UI or start intents.
Import whole subpackages to work around Eclipse loading bug with annotations.
Disabled local file/mime bittorrent intent to help users whose private trackers don't play nice (issue 460).
Correct showing/hiding of details screen list/empty text/loading progress.
Do not directly send bittorrent mime type urls to the server, but let Android download the file first (to work around authorization).
Fixed verious UI issues, such as details screen loading and text sizes.
Correct loading of details fragment (and stats and files) into phone and tablet fragments.
Only show 3 pane layout if screen is at least 900dp width.
Add up (home) button in action bar of all settings related activities.
Current filter list text size through separate view.
1.1.14 release (with torrent file download fix).
Added Synology NAS support.
Do not capture http bittorrent links from the browser, instead rely on local file scheme intents.
New 1.1.15 release with Synology NAS support.
Allow sorting of torrents main list.
Allow filtering (with text entry) on torrents list.\nUpgraded to Eclipse ADT tools v22.
Introduced a white theme (almost complete).
Updated turtle mode icons and fixed tutle mode status indication.
Trial with more compact torrent list layout and colour-based status indicator.
Have light and dark themes both available and make it user-selectable.
Fixed torrent list sorting.
Some UI fixes in details screen.
Improved layout and text sizes on large (tablet) screens.
Added import and export of settings (Transdroid 1.x settings can be imported too).
Properly show torrent action success result messages.
Making the contextual action bars work and allow setting of file priorities.
Fixed file priorities and added appropriate action bar icons.
Added JavaDoc comments and some formatting of code.
Added server status (counts and speeds) in the action bar.
Improved looks through differnt font family usage and margins.
Clean up of theme XML and fix font in action bar.
Disable long-clicks (enabling the CAB) for list subheaders.
Allow modification of selection (select all or invert) from the CAB.
Hide settings explanation when settings are available.
Merged default branch with Synology support into newui.
Updated Eclipse project for new ADT.
Fixed BitSnoop site name to enable its search provider.
Merged old Transdroid version project fixes into newui.
Added RSS feed feature UI.
Loading and parsing of RSS feeds and showing loading status in the UI.
Correct loading of RSS feeds UI and allow multi-select of items.
Finalized adding of torrents via http, file or magnet; also multiple http links at once via ADD_MULTIPLE.
Show a light grey line as details fragment divider on the far left.
Fixed the vertical divider line to display correctly on light and dark themes and only on tablets.
Correct details fragment line divider color on dark theme.
Replaced old merge and sack adapters will leaner, focussed merge and view holder adapter; the latter also correctly manages view visibility by showing and hiding rows.
Hack bug fix on pre-API level 11 devices when CAB done button is pressed.
Only allow multi select on file rows in details adapter.
Treat Transmission folder setting as Transmission 2.2's new option rpc-url (effectively replacing the default /transmission folder); see issue 341.
Added Ant (command line) build configuration.
